name: Roots of One Apartment
description:
FOR BROWSER FILES PLEASE KINDLY USE FULL SCREEN!

Play in an apartment that belonged to generations of one family, growing different historical origins and bringing one item from their culture to the apartment. Where are those artifacts now? Rotate the rooms and choose an appropriate position for each item in order to bring them to the nowadays. Be careful: in a family like this many events can lead to items loss, like moving to other houses, children and animals breaking them, and natural disasters happening...
